short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Type '::' followed by the emoji name to insert an emoji

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AnEmoji makes adding emojis to your Gmail emails faster and easier. Just type "::" followed by the emoji name, and AnEmoji will instantly insert the corresponding emoji into your message.

No more hunting through emoji keyboards or copy/pasting from other apps. With AnEmoji's extensive emoji name dictionary, you can type things like "::smile" or "::thumbs_up" and the emoji will appear in your email.

AnEmoji supports all the latest and most popular emojis, with new ones added automatically. It works right inside Gmail on the web, so your emojis will display properly for most recipients.

Add some personality to your emails today! Install the free AnEmoji extension for Google Chrome.

Feel free to get in touch to report bugs or request features by clicking the extension icon and then 'contact'.
